# aesv.io

Personal website of Axel Stevens.

## About

Systems Integrator at Cornell University.

## Sections

- / - Home page with dynamic widgets (Spotify, Strava, GitHub)
- /work - Professional work and projects
- /life - Personal interests and hobbies

## Technical

This site uses a terminal-as-viewport architecture where the server renders
HTML to exact grid dimensions (columns Ã— rows) received from the client.
Everything renders inside a single `<pre>` element for a monospace aesthetic.

Built with Node.js, Fastify, Nunjucks, and HTMX.
